Posts.Content: Mar 8, 2013 06:50AM manysunshine wrote: Thank you everyone.  I feel so much better after reading all your positive attitude.  It is such a horrible disease, but you're right, I should never lose hope no matter how bad things seem.  Thank you for helping me regain my strength.  I will go encourage my mom now:)
Posts.Title: is this hopeless? manysunshine Chickadee

Posts.Content: Dec 17, 2012 06:27AM manysunshine wrote: To those who responded, thank you very much for all the advice and encouragement.  Yes my mom is on zometa.  The neurosurgeon we met a few months ago was reluctant to operate because of the extensive mets, but as many of you reminded me, seeking a second or even a third opinion may be a good idea.
